text:
接著是女主角興奮度變化,從無表情->嬌喘可以一直摸腳實現,那接下來呢?
好像不管摸其他地方都不會再有表情變化,而且忍耐度會下降.
即使我現在9周目胸開發已經到50%,玩起來跟胸開發0%差不多感覺,如果是有我不知道的設定或攻略,麻煩告訴我吧!
最後說說優點吧,畫風很對味而且還是動畫,階段性沉淪也是很棒,本番的部分還沒玩到就不評論了.
trans:
Next is the change in the female protagonist's excitement level, from expressionless -> gasping with pleasure, and you can keep touching her feet. So what happens next?
It seems that touching other areas doesn't cause any further expression changes, and her endurance decreases.
Even though my chest development has reached 50% on the 9th playthrough, it feels almost the same as when chest development was at 0%. If there are settings or strategies I don't know about, please let me know!
Finally, let's talk about the good aspects: the art style is very fitting and it's still animated. The gradual descent into depravity is also great. I won't comment on the main scenes as I haven't played them yet.
